column5: I attended a tackle swap last year and really enjoyed it.  I would like to attend more this winter/spring.  If you know any upcoming tackle swaps, please post!  Thanks
Hamilton holds a great one. April.
Ft Erie has one the first Sunday of March break. Been running `10 years now.
Thanks, guys.  What's the location for the Fort Erie one?
It is at the  municipal community centre on Hwy#3
Think the big one on the Ancaster Fairgrounds is March 24
Thanks. I d be interested in any tackle swap shows in and around GTA.  London as well.
North GTA Tackle Swap No scheduled date at the moment but they've been doing it for the last 4 years
